{{flavour|A potion which confuses your perceptions and reduces your control over your own actions.}}

[[Quaff]]ing a '''potion of confusion''' will [[confusion|confuse]] your character for 1d8 + 2 (more) turns, up to 40, unless protected by an [[amulet of clarity]]. While confused you may lose control of your character. On the flip side, throw it at some enemies with the [[Evaporate]] spell to create a confusing 3x3 gas cloud that lasts a few turns, then make your escape.

 "You are confused."
 "You are more confused." (if you were already confused)
 "You feel momentarily confused." (with an amulet of clarity)

==History==
Potions of confusion were removed in [[0.16]].
